books.author: by Miranda Cowley Heller
books.description: After an extramarital dalliance, Elle must choose between her husband and her childhood love.
books.name: THE PAPER PALACE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: After tragedy upsets her stable family life, Maggie must decide if she will take a risk with a thrill seeker.
books.name: NINE LIVES

books.author: by T.J. Newman
books.description: A kidnapper demands that a pilot crash his plane with 144 passengers onboard to save his family.
books.name: FALLING

books.author: by Laura Dave
books.description: Hannah Hall discovers truths about her missing husband and bonds with his daughter from a previous relationship.
books.name: THE LAST THING HE TOLD ME

books.author: by Emily Henry
books.description: Opposites Poppy and Alex meet to vacation together one more time in hopes of saving their relationship.
books.name: PEOPLE WE MEET ON VACATION

books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The third book in the Jake Brigance series. A 16-year-old is accused of killing a deputy in Clanton, Miss., in 1990.
books.name: A TIME FOR MERCY

books.author: by Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: An epic party has serious outcomes for four famous siblings.
books.name: MALIBU RISING

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A battered wife raised in a violent home attempts to halt the cycle of abuse.
books.name: IT ENDS WITH US

books.author: by Quentin Tarantino
books.description: A novelization of the film set in 1969, by its director and screenwriter.
books.name: ONCE UPON A TIME IN HOLLYWOOD

books.author: by Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds a library beyond the edge of the universe that contains books with multiple possibilities of the lives one could have lived.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LIBRARY

books.author: by Kathy Reichs
books.description: The 20th book in the Temperance Brennan series.
books.name: THE BONE CODE

books.author: by James Patterson and Bill Clinton
books.description: Matthew Keating, a past president and former Navy SEAL, goes on his own to find his abducted teenage daughter.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT'S DAUGHTER

books.author: by Alex Michaelides
books.description: Theo Faber looks into the mystery of a famous painter who stops speaking after shooting her husband.
books.name: THE SILENT PATIENT

books.author: by Madeline Miller
books.description: A reimagining of Homer’s “Iliad” that is narrated by Achilles' companion Patroclus.
books.name: THE SONG OF ACHILLES
